com

Class CopyAll

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CopyAll

  • public class CopyAll
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a program which accepts 2-3 parameters. First two parameters are the source and the destination directories' name. If no third parameter is specified then all the files from the source directory are copied to the destination directory. If a third parameter is specified, then it is considered as a file extension, therefore, copying all the files only with that file extension. The program keeps the directory structure.
    Since:
    29.03.2018
    Author:
    Dushan Terzikj 30001357, Dragi Kamov 30001478, Fanlin Wang 30000522, Sajit Kunwar 20331648

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.lang.String src,
                        java.lang.String dest)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method copies a file with name src to a file with name dest. It uses InputStream and OutputStream to copy the files.
        Parameters:
        src - the name file which is copied
        dest - the name of the file to which is pasted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getExtension

        public static java.lang.String getExtension(java.io.File f)
        This is a helper method which returns the file extension of a file f.
        Parameters:
        f - the file whose extension is returned
        Returns:
        the file extension, null if there is no extension

      • listFiles

        public static void listFiles(java.lang.String src,
                             java.lang.String dest,
                             java.lang.String extension)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method lists a current directory. First it recursively lists any other directories in the current directory and then copies all the files which match the extension If extension is null it copies all the files using copy().
        Parameters:
        src - the name of the source file
        dest - the name of the destination file
        extension -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        destdir -
        Returns:
        true if both files exists, false otherwise
